item.title: Toggling MC18 Navigation (and Status) Bar visible state
item.author: pfm@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: MC18 is the only Zebra Android mobile computer (at least till now) that uses a Navigation bar instead of phisycal buttons for the back and home. This is the first device where it makes sense to use Android immersive mode! The problem with the standard immersive mode is that swiping from the bottom or the top of the screen re-enable both Navigation and Status bar. It’s not really intended to be a kiosk mode… is just to have a full screen capability.
